page.title: 17DUNBAR COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content:
The new Council was formed in May. It is composed of 3 wards which take in amost exactly the area of the original Royal Burgh. There are 12 councillors for each ward but an election was only required in one ward. The councillors do not stand on a political basis although some are active in the main political parties.
************************************** * {Chairman} Stephen Bunyan * * {Vice-Chairman}Richard Koch * * {Secretary} Catherine Acton * *{ Treasurer } Robin Forster * * {Members} M.Kersh, D.Hawrluk, * * C.Togneri,A.White, * * D.Cairney,N. Laing, * * J.Spankster, * * D.Hampshire * * * **************************************
